marklogic.body:
And what exactly makes you think that the likes of DHL (now Yodel), TNT and the like are any better?
It was a FedEx driver Spotted throwing that computer screen over the gates, not a postie, and I had an interesting conversation with a controller at a private company I use for heavier parcels regarding one which was supposed to have been stolen Off the van whilst en route to delivery (it hadn't been, it was a HUGE box, full of books and very heavy, the driver just couldn't find the house and preferred to say it had been stolen rather than keep looking).
A privatised service will be extremely expensive, probably of poor quality, and people living in more isolated places, or on islands, will be lucky to get any service at all.
